name: FLOKI
description: FLOKI is the utility token of the Floki Ecosystem. The Floki Ecosystem is a community-powered ecosystem that aims to give people control of their finances through four key utility offerings: - The Valhalla NFT Metaverse Game. - The Floki University Crypto Education platform. - DeFi. - The FlokiPlaces NFT & Merchandise Marketplace. There is a 3% tax on every buy/sell transaction on the FLOKI contract which goes to a treasury wallet that is used to fund development and growth activity. You can buy FLOKI with a 3 - 5% slippage.
